articles.author: Silvia Recchimuzzi
articles.title: World chess champion alleges teenage rival has cheated more than he admits - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: World champion Magnus Carlsen has broken his silence about why he resigned after just one move in his game last week against 19-year-old American Hans Niemann.
articles.content: Gdask: World chess champion Magnus Carlsen said he believed Hans Niemann had cheated more - and more recently - than he has publicly admitted, adding he no longer wanted to play against the American … [+1373 chars]

articles.title: Putin grants citizenship to Edward Snowden, who exposed U.S. surveillance - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Russian president had previously granted asylum to the former American security consultant and refused to allow his extradition.

articles.title: Chess: World champion Magnus Carlsen alleges Hans Niemann has cheated more than he admits - The Straits Times
articles.description:

articles.title: NASA's role in our society | Drop the Mic - WUSA9
articles.description: We watched a little bit of history tonight, and it only cost the American public, that's you and me, an estimated $320 million to see it.
